description: Spend your summer days exploring, interacting with residents, and investigating local legends to uncover the mystery hiding behind the townâ€™s idyllic exterior. With gorgeous artwork from Yuki Kato, lead artist behind the BLAZBLUE franchise, and top-quality production values, WORLDEND SYNDROME is a romantic horror story that will send a shiver up your spine but have you asking for more!
name: WORLDEND SYNDROME
